type X509Certificate = class interface IDeserializationCallback interface ISerializable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供協助您使用 X.509 v.3 憑證的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that help you use X.509 v.3 certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASN.1 DER 是此類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 大部分的情況下，您應該使用類別。For most scenarios, you should use the class instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個型別會實作介面。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和更早的版本類別不會實作介面，並因此不需要`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下列範例會載入 X.509 憑證的檔案，呼叫從方法，並顯示結果到主控台。The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the method, and displays the results to the console. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASN.1 DER 是此類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`data`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `data`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store. ## Examples 下列範例會載入到 X.509 憑證檔案物件，會將憑證匯出為位元組陣列，並接著匯入的位元組陣列另一個物件。The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立新物件使用的控制代碼，Microsoft Cryptographic API 憑證內容， `PCCERT_CONTEXT`。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個建構函式會建立憑證內容的複本。This constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 請勿假設您傳遞至建構函式的內容結構是有效的;有已發行。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 您可以取得一份目前`PCCERT_CONTEXT`結構屬性，但它是有效的存留期間只物件。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASN.1 DER 是此類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只要在 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中開啟組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個建構函式，以正確的密碼解密的私密金鑰，並將它儲存至 Microsoft 密碼編譯 API 密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). ASN.1 DER 是此類別所支援的唯一憑證格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只要在 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中開啟組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您建立藉由指定的 PKCS7 已簽署的檔案存放區的憑證`rawData`，則建立簽署的存放區的憑證，而不是在存放區中的憑證。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
